arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Paris squad: A major come-back
arts.sum: This Wednesday (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir for Matchday 10 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. Here is the squad selected by PSG coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. Midfielders – Lee, Mayulu, […]

arts.sum: Lorient and PSG go head-to-head in Ligue 1 on Wednesday at the Stade du Moustoir – Yves Allainmat.
